message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $150.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $100 for it. What do you say?
I understand you're on a budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $100. I can meet you halfway at $130. What do you think?
Alice, $130 is still a bit high for me.  I'm really interested in the product, but I can only go up to $115.  Let me know what you think.

I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you at $125. It's a good compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but $125 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable spending.  Would you be willing to go down to $120? I'm really hoping we can make this work.

I can see you're really trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I've already said I won't go below $125. However, I'm willing to throw in a small bonus with the purchase, which will make it a great value for you. I'll meet you at $125, and I'll include a free accessory that complements the product perfectly. What do you think?
